select * from stu_upload su,tea_upload tu,student s,course c where su.studentId=s.studentId and su.courseId=c.courseId and su.homeworkId = tu.homeworkId
and su.studentId like concat ('%',#{studentId},'%')
and su.courseId like concat ('%',#{courseId},'%')

select a.stuUploadId,a.loginName,a.content,a.date,sum(a.score) score,sum(a.submit) submit,sum(a.correct) correct,a.courseName from (select stuUploadId,student.loginName,content,date,score,submit,correct,courseName from student,stu_upload,course where stu_upload.studentId=student.studentId and stu_upload.homeworkId=#{homeworkId} and course.courseId=stu_upload.courseId union select 0 as stuUploadId,student.loginName,NULL as content,NULL as date,0 as score,0 as submit,0 as correct,course.courseName from student,teacher,teacher_clazz,course where student.clazzId=teacher_clazz.clazzId and teacher_clazz.teacherId=teacher.teacherId and teacher.teacherId=#{teacherId} and teacher.courseId=course.courseId) a group by a.loginName

-- 加一个correct select b.loginName,b.content,b.date,b.score,b.courseName,b.submit,b.correct from (select a.loginName,a.content,a.date,sum(a.score) score,sum(a.submit) submit,sum(a.correct) correct,a.courseName from (select student.loginName,content,date,score,submit,correct,courseName from student,stu_upload,course where stu_upload.studentId=student.studentId and stu_upload.homeworkId=#{homeworkId} and course.courseId=stu_upload.courseId union select student.loginName,NULL as content,NULL as date,0 as score,0 as submit,0 as correct,course.courseName from student,teacher,teacher_clazz,course
where student.clazzId=teacher_clazz.clazzId and teacher_clazz.teacherId=teacher.teacherId and teacher.teacherId=#{teacherId} and teacher.courseId=course.courseId) a group by a.loginName) b where b.submit=#{submit}
